content:
One theme we discussed yesterday was how to do a better job soliciting ideas for discussion topics. I have a proposal I want to float.

The CTCFT team will generally pick themes for the next couple of months. Each month, when we post our itinerary, we'll also announce the proposed themes for the next few months and put out a "call for proposals". We can also solicit "proposed themes" at the same time.

Folks can propose things by opening issues on the repo, dropping notes here on Zulip, or by writing us privately, as they prefer.
@nikomatsakis do you want to take a minute during the welcome to mention this proposal?
but I didn't really prepare for that
I'd prefer if we had a place to point people etc
